tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EndangeredSpeciesPopulation (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(50),
  population_size INT,
  endangered_status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    location_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    latitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL,
    longitude DECIMAL(10, 6) NOT NULL,
    species_id INT REFERENCES species(species_id) ON DELETE CASCADE
);

CREATE TABLE EndangeredSpecies (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  scientific_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50),
  habitat_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE PopulationTracking (
  tracking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT REFERENCES EndangeredSpecies(species_id),
  organization_id INT REFERENCES ConservationOrganizations(organization_id),
  population_size INT,
  tracking_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE endangered_species (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_name STRING,
 population_count INT,
 location STRING
)

CREATE TABLE conservation_teams (
 team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 team_name STRING,
 team_lead STRING
)

CREATE TABLE habitats (
 habitat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 habitat_type STRING,
 habitat_area FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE observations (
 observation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 species_id INT,
 team_id INT,
 observation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE endangered_species (
  species_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_name VARCHAR(255),
  population_size INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  conservation_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE population_data (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  population INT,
  survey_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_population_species FOREIGN KEY (species_id)
    REFERENCES endangered_species(species_id)
)

CREATE TABLE conservation_areas (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  habitat_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE species_habitat (
  habitat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  species_id INT,
  area_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_species_habitat_species FOREIGN KEY (species_id)
    REFERENCES endangered_species(species_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_species_habitat_area FOREIGN KEY (area_id)
    REFERENCES conservation_areas(area_id)
)

CREATE TABLE conservation_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  area_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_project_area FOREIGN KEY (area_id)
    REFERENCES conservation_areas(area_id)
)
